entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes I recently purchased.
Okay, I can help you with that. Can I get your order number, please?
Sure, it's #VF12345.
Thanks. And what's the reason for the return?
They just didn't fit right after I used them. They felt fine when I tried them on, but after a ride, they were too tight.
I understand. Just to clarify, have the shoes been mounted to your pedals or show any signs of use, such as cleat marks?
Yes, I did install cleats and use them on one ride. So there are definitely cleat marks.

Okay, thank you for confirming. Unfortunately, because the shoes have been mounted and show clear signs of usage with cleat marks, we cannot accept the return. Once shoes have been mounted they are no longer considered new.
Oh, really? I didn't realize that.

Yes, I'm sorry. Once cycling shoes have been installed and used, we can’t resell them as new. Our return policy states that items must be in new and unused condition. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Well, I also bought a new tire, but I used it and I want to return it.
And were the tires installed and used?
Yes, just for one ride, but they have dirty tires now.

I understand. Unfortunately, because the tires have been installed, used, and are dirty tires, we cannot accept a return. We cannot resell used tires once they have been installed. I'm very sorry for any inconvenience this may cause.
Okay, I understand. Thanks for explaining. I will keep that in mind for the future.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business with VeloFit. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again for your help!
Have a great day! Goodbye.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. Goodbye.
